SEARCH
Package main

Class SongReader

java.lang.Object
main.SongReader
public class SongReader extends Object
The SongReader class handles reading and parsing text files into BellNote objects. The class consists of the following methods:
  • readFile(String)
  • parseNoteLength(String)
  • parseNote(String)
  • validateNotes(List)

  • Field Summary

    Directory all text files are stored in.

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public List<BellNote> readFile(String fileName)
      Reads the given file and converts each line into a BellNote object, and returns a list of all valid BellNotes found in the file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file to read.
      Returns:
      A List of BellNote objects, or an empty List if no valid notes are found.
      See Also:
      • parseNoteLength(String)
      • parseNote(String)

    • validateNotes

      public boolean validateNotes(List<BellNote> notes)
      Checks if each note in the given List of Bellnotes is valid.
      A BellNote is valid if:
      • It's Note is not INVALID
      • It's NoteLength is not INVALID
      Parameters:
      notes - List of BellNote objects to check.
      Returns:
      true if all the notes in the list are valid and there is at least one note, false otherwise.

    • parseNote

      public Note parseNote(String note)
      Parses the given string into a Note.
      Parameters:
      note - String to parse.
      Returns:
      Note enum which represents the Note, Note.INVALID if the given string is not a valid Note.

    • parseNoteLength

      public NoteLength parseNoteLength(String noteLength)
      Parses the given string into a NoteLength.
      Parameters:
      noteLength - String to parse.
      Returns:
      NoteLength enum which represents the Note Length, NoteLength.INVALID if the given string is not a valid NoteLength.
